name: Vision Transformer (ViT) Detection
description: Uses Vision Transformer architecture to capture long-range dependencies in images. ViT excels at detecting subtle global patterns that CNNs may miss in AI-generated content.

references.title: Dosovitskiy, A. et al. (2021). An Image is Worth 16x16 Words: Transformers for Image Recognition at Scale. ICLR.
Cocchi, F. et al. (2023). Unveiling the Impact of Image Transformations on Deepfake Detection. Image and Vision Computing.
